font_size="custom-sz" custom_font_size="28px" line="no"][vc_column_text]Because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? Monotonectally administrate holistic users for ethical ideas extend granular potentialities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1483716054065{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][title title="My Experience" title_uppercase="no" font_size="custom-sz" custom_font_size="21px" title_margin="0px 0px 21px 0px" line="no"][vc_column_text]Feb, 2017 - Till Date CEO of AB Digital Studio Aug, 2015 - Dec, 2016 Senior Designer at Falcon Studio Mar, 2013 - July, 2015 Designer at Amazee Apr, 2012 - Nov, 2012 Designer at Warp Artist [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1483791880543{padding-top: 65px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_empty_space][portfolio portfolio_style="masonry" insert_type="id" no_of_items="10" portfolio_id="631,632,635,637,634,633,636,639,638,2133"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
